LanguageData.Initial_katana.label: 初始武士刀
LanguageData.Initial_katana.description: 初始武士刀,比长剑更好,应该很适合训练.
LanguageData.Initial_katana.tools.point.label: 刀尖
LanguageData.Initial_katana.tools.edge.label: 刀刃
LanguageData.Initial_katana.tools.handle.label: 刀柄
LanguageData.Entei.label: 炎帝
LanguageData.Entei.description: 炎帝,攻击能点燃敌人,其巨大的刀刃让敌人望而生畏.
LanguageData.Entei.tools.point.label: 刀尖
LanguageData.Entei.tools.edge.label: 刀刃
LanguageData.Entei.tools.handle.label: 刀柄
LanguageData.Dianqing.label: 靛青
LanguageData.Dianqing.description: 靛青,攻击能使敌人陷入电磁状态,其巨大的刀刃让敌人望而生畏.
LanguageData.Dianqing.tools.point.label: 刀尖
LanguageData.Dianqing.tools.edge.label: 刀刃
LanguageData.Dianqing.tools.handle.label: 刀柄
LanguageData.Wethermon_tachi.label: 衛札衛門的太刀
LanguageData.Wethermon_tachi.tools.point.label: 刀尖
LanguageData.Wethermon_tachi.tools.edge.label: 刀刃
LanguageData.Wethermon_tachi.tools.handle.label: 刀柄
